statements: DELETE FROM SecurityPatches WHERE software_name = 'Firewall' AND compliance_standard = 'ISO27001';
DELETE FROM SecurityPatches WHERE compliance_standard = 'ISO 27001' AND software_name = 'Firewall';
DELETE FROM security_patches WHERE software_name = 'Windows' AND patch_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM compliance_standards WHERE standard_name = 'PCI DSS' AND standard_description LIKE '%security%';
DELETE FROM patch_compliance WHERE standard_id = 1 AND patch_id = 4;
DELETE FROM patch_applications WHERE patch_id = 5 AND software_id = 10;
DELETE FROM software_compliance WHERE standard_id = 3 AND software_id = 14;
